aWLI_StateProvision.content:
SUPPLEMENT TO GROUP LIFE POLICY AND SUBJECT TO THE TERMS & CONDITIONS OF THE GROUP LIFE POLICY
OPTIONAL LIFE INSURANCE BENEFITS
The Group Life Policy provides You with the option of purchasing additional life coverage, available at Your own expense. The Certificate's Schedule of Benefits states the maximum additional cover which can be purchased and also displays what additional cover You have selected. EVIDENCE OF GOOD HEALTH Evidence of good health must be supplied to Us, and accepted by Us, before any additional cover can be implemented. If the additional cover is approved, the coverage will go into effect from the first of the month following Our acceptance. SUBJECT TO OVERALL MAXIMUM SUM ASSURED The Group Life coverage together with any Optional Life cover selected is subject to the overall Maximum Sum Insured amount stated in Your Certificate's Schedule of Benefits.
aWLI_StateProvision.Title: Optional Life Insurance
aWLI_StateProvision.Name: Group Life-Optional Life
